text:
"Fagun Bou" (); is an Indian Bengali television soap opera that Premiered on 19 March 2018 and airs on STAR Jalsha. The show stars Vikram Chatterjee and Oindrilla Sen in lead roles.This show marks the comeback of Vikram Chatterjee and Oindrilla Sen on television, the latter after 6 years.
Plot.
Ayandeep marries Mahul, who has feeling for Anuroop. Turns out Anuroop and Ayandeep are brothers. With the three of them under the same roof, a complicated love triangle is ensured.
